00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define BFTM_MODE                      (1)   /* 0: Timer by GPTM, 1: Timer by BFTM                          */
00048 
00049 #define LED_GRB_DATA_LEN               (3)     /* 3 bytes                                                   */
00050 #define LED_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_TYPES      (3)     /* 3 color type                                              */
00051 
00052 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 #define DELAY_5US                      (300)   /* DELAY_5US / SystemCoreClock = 5us                         */
00054 #define DELAY_10US                     (600)   /* DELAY_10US / SystemCoreClock = 10us                       */
00055 #define DELAY_20US                     (1200)  /* DELAY_20US / SystemCoreClock = 20us                       */
00056 #define DELAY_50US                     (3000)  /* DELAY_50US / SystemCoreClock = 50us                       */
00057 
00058 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 void CKCU_Configuration(void);
00060 void TM_Configuration(void);
00061 u32 ARGB_Feedback(void);
00062 void SLED_Configuration(void);
00063 void SLED_MainRoutine(void);
00064 static void __Delay(u32 count);
00065 
00066 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 u8 __ALIGN4 gGRBTable[LED_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_TYPES][LED_GRB_DATA_LEN] = {
00068   { 0x00, 0xFF, 0x00 },     /* Red                                                                          */
00069   { 0xFF, 0x00, 0x00 },     /* Green                                                                        */
00070   { 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF },     /* Blue                                                                         */
00071 };
00072 
00073 u32 i, j, k;
00074 u32 gLampBead;
00075 
00076 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00078   * @brief  Main program.
00079   * @retval None
00080   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00081 int main(void)
00082 {
00083   RETARGET_Configuration();
00084 
00085   printf ("ARGB Feedback Mode Test\r\n");
00086 
00087   CKCU_Configuration();               /* System Related Configuration                                       */
00088 
00089   TM_Configuration();
00090 
00091   gLampBead = ARGB_Feedback();
00092 
00093   SLED_Configuration();
00094 
00095   while (1)
00096   {
00097     SLED_MainRoutine();
00098   }
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00102   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00103   * @retval None
00104   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00105 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00106 {
00107 #if 1
00108   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00109   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO            = 1;
00110   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_SLED_CK   = 1;
00111   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00112 #endif
00113 }
00114 
00115 #if (BFTM_MODE == ENABLE)
00116 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00117   * @brief  Configure the Timer.
00118   * @retval None
00119   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00120 void TM_Configuration(void)
00121 {
00122   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00123   CKCUClock.Bit.BFTM0      = 1;
00124   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00125 
00126   BFTM_SetCompare(HT_BFTM0, SystemCoreClock / 1000000 * 160); /* CompareTime = 160us                        */
00127   BFTM_ClearFlag(HT_BFTM0);
00128   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00129 
00130   BFTM_EnaCmd(HT_BFTM0, ENABLE);
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00134   * @brief  ARGB Feedback Mode, returns number of lamp beads.
00135   * @retval None
00136   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00137 u32 ARGB_Feedback(void)
00138 {
00139   u32 uLampbead = 0;
00140   u32 uCount;
00141   /* Configure SLED to GPIO mode                                                                            */
00142   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SLED_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00143 
00144   /* Configure GPIO direction of output pins                                                                */
00145   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, RESET);
00146   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00147 
00148   /* Generate feedback mode waveform.                                                                       */
00149   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00150   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, SET);
00151   while(BFTM_GetCounter(HT_BFTM0) < DELAY_20US);
00152 
00153   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00154   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, RESET);
00155   while(BFTM_GetCounter(HT_BFTM0) < DELAY_10US);
00156 
00157   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00158   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, SET);
00159   while(BFTM_GetCounter(HT_BFTM0) < DELAY_50US);
00160 
00161   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00162   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, RESET);
00163   while(BFTM_GetCounter(HT_BFTM0) < DELAY_5US);
00164 
00165   /* Configure GPIO direction of input pins                                                                 */
00166   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_IN);
00167 
00168   /* Configure GPIO pull resistor of input pins                                                             */
00169   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_DOWN);
00170 
00171   GPIO_InputConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, ENABLE);
00172 
00173   /* Get reply information                                                                                  */
00174   while (BFTM_GetFlagStatus(HT_BFTM0) == RESET)
00175   {
00176     while (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 0 && BFTM_GetFlagStatus(HT_BFTM0) == RESET){};
00177     if (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 1 && BFTM_GetFlagStatus(HT_BFTM0) == RESET)
00178     {
00179       BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00180       uLampbead++;
00181     }
00182     while (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 1 && BFTM_GetFlagStatus(HT_BFTM0) == RESET){};
00183     if (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 0 && BFTM_GetFlagStatus(HT_BFTM0) == RESET)
00184     {
00185       uCount = BFTM_GetCounter(HT_BFTM0);
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   /* Configure GPIO direction of output pins                                                                */
00190   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00191 
00192   printf ("Drive Current Time= %d us    LampBead= %d\r\n" ,uCount * 1000000 / SystemCoreClock ,uLampbead);
00193 
00194   return uLampbead;
00195 }
00196 
00197 #else
00198 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00199   * @brief  Configure the Timer.
00200   * @retval None
00201   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00202 void TM_Configuration(void)
00203 {
00204   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00205      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00206      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00207   */
00208   TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00209   TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00210 
00211   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00212   CKCUClock.Bit.GPTM0      = 1;
00213   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00214 
00215   /* Configure xxTM Channel 0 to count time.                                                                */
00216   TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00217   TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 65535;
00218   TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = 0;
00219   TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00220   TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00221   TM_TimeBaseInit(HT_GPTM0, &TimeBaseInit);
00222 
00223   TM_ClearFlag(HT_GPTM0, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00224 
00225   /* Init GPTM0 input mode configuration                                                                    */
00226   OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_0;
00227   OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM1;
00228   OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00229   OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00230   OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00231   OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00232   OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00233   OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00234   OutInit.Compare = SystemCoreClock / 1000000 * 160;      /* CompareTime = 160us                            */
00235   OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00236   TM_OutputInit(HT_GPTM0, &OutInit);
00237 
00238   TM_Cmd(HT_GPTM0, ENABLE);
00239 }
00240 
00241 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00242   * @brief  ARGB Feedback Mode, returns number of lamp beads.
00243   * @retval None
00244   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00245 u32 ARGB_Feedback(void)
00246 {
00247   u32 uLampbead = 0;
00248   u32 uCount = 0;
00249 
00250   /* Configure SLED to GPIO mode                                                                            */
00251   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SLED_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00252 
00253   /* Configure GPIO direction of output pins                                                                */
00254   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, RESET);
00255   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00256 
00257   /* Generate feedback mode waveform.                                                                       */
00258   TM_SetCounter(HT_GPTM0, 0);
00259   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, SET);
00260   while(TM_GetCounter(HT_GPTM0) < DELAY_20US);
00261 
00262   TM_SetCounter(HT_GPTM0, 0);
00263   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, RESET);
00264   while(TM_GetCounter(HT_GPTM0) < DELAY_10US);
00265 
00266   TM_SetCounter(HT_GPTM0, 0);
00267   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, SET);
00268   while(TM_GetCounter(HT_GPTM0) < DELAY_50US);
00269 
00270   TM_SetCounter(HT_GPTM0, 0);
00271   GPIO_WriteOutBits(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, RESET);
00272   while(TM_GetCounter(HT_GPTM0) < DELAY_5US);
00273 
00274   /* Configure GPIO direction of input pins                                                                 */
00275   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_IN);
00276 
00277   /* Configure GPIO pull resistor of input pins                                                             */
00278   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_DOWN);
00279 
00280   GPIO_InputConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, ENABLE);
00281 
00282   /* Get reply information                                                                                  */
00283   while (TM_GetFlagStatus(HT_GPTM0, TM_FLAG_UEV) == RESET)
00284   {
00285     while (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 0 && TM_GetFlagStatus(HT_GPTM0, TM_FLAG_UEV) == RESET){};
00286     if (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 1 && TM_GetFlagStatus(HT_GPTM0, TM_FLAG_UEV) == RESET)
00287     {
00288       TM_SetCounter(HT_GPTM0, 0);
00289       uLampbead++;
00290     }
00291     while (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 1 && TM_GetFlagStatus(HT_GPTM0, TM_FLAG_UEV) == RESET){};
00292     if (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN) == 0 && TM_GetFlagStatus(HT_GPTM0, TM_FLAG_UEV) == RESET)
00293     {
00294       uCount = TM_GetCounter(HT_GPTM0);
00295     }
00296   }
00297 
00298   /* Configure GPIO direction of output pins                                                                */
00299   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_SLED, HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00300 
00301   printf ("Drive Current Time= %d us    LampBead= %d\r\n", (u32) (uCount * 1000000 / SystemCoreClock), uLampbead);
00302 
00303   return uLampbead;
00304 }
00305 #endif
00306 
00307 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00308   * @brief  Configure the SLED.
00309   * @retval None
00310   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00311 void SLED_Configuration(void)
00312 {
00313   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00314      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00315      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00316   */
00317   SLED_InitTypeDef SLED_InitStruct;
00318   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00319 
00320   /* Enable SLED & AFIO APB clock                                                                           */
00321   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO             = 1;
00322   CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_SLED_IPN   = 1;
00323   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00324 
00325   /* Configure GPIO to SLED mode                                                                            */
00326   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SLED_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SLED);
00327 
00328   /* Configure SLED                                                                                         */
00329   SLED_InitStruct.ClockPrescaler = HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER;   /* F_PCLK / HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER= 20 MHz   */
00330   SLED_InitStruct.BaudRate       = HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE - 1;   /* F_SCLK / HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE    = 833 kHz  */
00331   SLED_InitStruct.TRST           = HTCFG_SLED_RESET - 1;      /* HTCFG_SLED_RESET * 1.2us        = 250us    */
00332   SLED_InitStruct.T0H            = HTCFG_SLED_T0H - 1;        /* 6/24 = 25% Duty. 1.2us*(25/100)= 0.3us     */
00333   SLED_InitStruct.T1H            = HTCFG_SLED_T1H - 1;        /* 18/24 = 75% Duty. 1.2us*(75/100)= 0.9us    */
00334   SLED_InitStruct.SyncState      = SLED_SYNC_STATE_T0;
00335   SLED_InitStruct.IdleState      = SLED_IDLE_STATE_LOW;
00336   SLED_InitStruct.ResetState     = SLED_RESET_STATE_LOW;
00337   SLED_InitStruct.SyncMode       = SLED_SYNC_MODE_DISABLE;
00338   SLED_InitStruct.OutputPolarity = SLED_OUTPUT_NONINVERTING;
00339   SLED_Init(HTCFG_SLED_PORT, &SLED_InitStruct);
00340 
00341   /* Enable SLED                                                                                            */
00342   SLED_OutputCmd(HTCFG_SLED_PORT, ENABLE);
00343   SLED_FIFOTrigLevelConfig(HTCFG_SLED_PORT, SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_0);
00344   SLED_Cmd(HTCFG_SLED_PORT, ENABLE);
00345 }
00346 
00347 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00348   * @brief  SLED Main Routine.
00349   * @retval None
00350   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00351 void SLED_MainRoutine(void)
00352 {
00353   /* Select color type                                                                                      */
00354   for (i = 0; i < LED_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_TYPES; i++)
00355   {
00356     /* Select LED                                                                                           */
00357     for (j = 0; j < gLampBead; j++)
00358     {
00359       /* Select RGB                                                                                         */
00360       for (k = 0; k < LED_GRB_DATA_LEN; k++)
00361       {
00362         /* Send data                                                                                        */
00363         HTCFG_SLED_PORT->DR_8BIT = gGRBTable[i][k]; /* RGB Data. 8-bit access, duplicate 4 times into 32-bit*/
00364       }
00365       /* Waiting for transfer to complete                                                                   */
00366       while (SLED_GetFIFOStatus(HTCFG_SLED_PORT) != 0);
00367     }
00368    /* Delay                                                                                                 */
00369     __Delay(SystemCoreClock/30);
00370   }
00371 }
00372 
00373 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00374 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00375   * @brief  delay function
00376   * @param  count: delay count for loop
00377   * @retval None
00378   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00379 static void __Delay(u32 count)
00380 {
00381   while (count--)
00382   {
00383     __NOP(); // Prevent delay loop be optimized
00384   }
00385 }
